Kalittokai 50.
itu “puṇarntapiṉ avaṉvayiṉ vaṇaṅkaṟkaṭ” ṭōḻi kūṟiyatu. atu tōḻiyiṟ kūṭṭam nikaḻntapiṉ muṟkālattup paṇintu piṉṉiṉ-ṟōṉait tōḻi tāṉē paṇin toḻukutalām.
vāṅkukō ṉelloṭu vāṅki varuvaikaṉ
mūṅkiṉ micainta muḻantā ḷirumpiṭi
tūṅkilai vāḻai naṉipukku ñāṅkar
varuṭai maṭamaṟi yūrviṭait tuñcu
miruṭūṅku cōlai yilaṅkunīr veṟpa;
araviṉ poṟiyu maṇaṅkum puṇarnta
vuravuviṉ mēlacaitta kaiyai yorāṅku
niraivaḷai muṉkaiyeṉ ṟōḻiyai nōkkip
paṭikiḷi pāyum paiṅkura lēṉal
kaṭitaṉ maṟappittā yāyi ṉiṉinī
neṭituḷḷa lōmputal vēṇṭu mivaḷē
palkōṭ palaviṉ payirppuṟu tīṅkaṉi
yalkaṟaik koṇṭū ṇamalaic ciṟukuṭi
nalkūrntār celva makaḷ;
nīyē, vaḷiyi ṉikaṉmikun tēruṅ kaḷiṟun
taḷiyiṟ ciṟantaṉai vanta pulavark
kaḷiyoṭu kaitū valai;
ataṉāṟ,
kaṭumā kaṭavuṟūuṅ kōlpō leṉaittuṅ
koṭumaiyilai yāva taṟintu maṭuppal
vaḻaivaḷar cāral varuṭai naṉmāṉ
kuḻavi vaḷarppavar pōlap pārāṭṭi
yuḻaiyiṟ piriyiṟ piriyu
miḻaiyaṇi yalkuleṉ ṟōḻiyatu kaviṉē.
